description.part1: Hi, it's me, Jeanne, a 26 years old front-end web developer based in Quebec city.
description.part2: I come from an artistic background and first studied to become a profesionnal guitar maker, kind of unusual I know !
description.part3: But this first experience still serves me to this day : I learned to love well-crafted projects and practice-based learning, and try to carry on my creative side into the web-development world.
description.part4: I am a passion-driven person and programming and its infinite possibilities is what keeps me learning everyday.
description.part5: I can not wait to start a new project, why not with you ?
